Question.Subject: I want to read my mail in Outlook Express but it opens up in Windows Live Mail instead. What do I do?
Question.Content: I tried deleting my email account that Windows Live Mail imported to it but the messages still pop up in Windows Live Mail. I want them back in Outlook Express. Please tell me what I need to do to correct this. It doesn't help when I set the default to OE.
Question.ChosenAnswer: you need to make OE your default for mail in OE, ie "make outlook express my default mail handler" in options

Answer.Content: you need to make OE your default for mail in OE, ie "make outlook express my default mail handler" in options
